entry.title: Friday: Showers. High 14.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Showers beginning this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h becoming west 20 this afternoon. High 14. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of drizzle or rain. Low plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Showers ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 14 April 2023
